events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in days and I am very worried about the delay.
The issue has been classified under delivery delay based on the description regarding late shipment and no recent tracking updates.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the case regarding the delayed shipment and tracking concerns.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear your order has not arrived yet. I'll do my best to help resolve this issue quickly for you.
Could you please provide me with your order number and the tracking number shown in your account? This will help me investigate the delay.
Thanks for the reply. My order number is 987654321 and the tracking number is TRK123456789. Please let me know what you find.
After checking, it seems the shipment was delayed due to courier issues. We can either issue a reshipment immediately or offer a full refund. Please let me know your preference.
I appreciate the options. Please proceed with a reshipment as I still want the product. Thank you for the prompt response.
We have arranged for your order to be resent with expedited shipping. You should receive a new tracking number shortly.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement order arrived as expected. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and everything looks great. Thanks for handling this so well!
Closing the case now since the replacement order was received and there are no further issues reported. Thank you for your patience.
